title: Plaintiff in Lawsuit Opposing Biden Student Debt Forgiveness Had PPP Loan Forgiven
description:
The lawsuit, aimed at ending Biden’s debt forgiveness program, is being bankrolled by a well-connected right-wing group.

title: Kentucky Voters Reject Amendment 2 in “Repudiation of Extreme Anti-Choice Agenda”
description:

title: Midterms Show Republican Anti-Abortion Agenda Relies on Minority Rule
description:
But that doesn’t mean we can rest easy in the fight for reproductive justice.

title: Georgia's Turnout Boss, Stacey Abrams, Had a Turnout Problem
description:
Georgia’s election this year was supposed to be a turnout game, just like 2018 and 2020. You wouldn’t know it from last night's results.

title: In Referendum on Whether You Can Prosecute Murderous Cops at All, Keith Ellison Ekes It Out
description:

title: The Midterms Handed Democrats in Congress a Mandate to Codify Abortion Rights
description:
With 48 senators supporting a filibuster carveout for abortion rights, Democrats should act before the new Congress.

title: With Senate Race Too Early to Call, Pennsylvania Democrats Rack Up Wins in Quicker Decisions
description:
